documentation.text:
@dev Retrieve authors in which a user is subsribed to
 @param _user Address of user requesting associated subscriptions

@dev Allow a user to subscribe to a publishing article's author
 @param _author Address associated with article's publishing author

@dev Allow a user to unsubscribe from an author
 @param _author Address associated with article's publishing author

devdoc.details: dApp is a simple publishing platform that allows web3-connected users to  publish articles, view other authors publishings, and subscribe/unsubscribe to/from authors. Every new article is also minted as an ERC721 standard NFT, where the ownership is transferred to the authoring user.

createArticle(string,string).details: Creates a new article & mint as NFT via `createCollectible`

getUserToSubscribedAuthors(address).details: Retrieve authors in which a user is subsribed to

params._user: Address of user requesting associated subscriptions

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setBaseURI(string).details: update the base URI in case of changes in future providers

subscribeToAuthor(address).details: Allow a user to subscribe to a publishing article's author

params._author: Address associated with article's publishing author

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unsubscribeFromAuthor(address).details: Allow a user to unsubscribe from an author

params._author: Address associated with article's publishing author

devdoc.title: Decentrastack
